name: Corpus Christi (Boze cialo) (2020)
description: \n                    Corpus Christi is the story of a 20-year-old Daniel who experiences a spiritual transformation while living in a Youth Detention Center.  He wants to become a priest but this is impossible because of his criminal record.  When he is sent to work at a carpenter's workshop in a small town, on arrival he dresses up as a priest and accidentally takes over the local parish. \n
